Detailed Description

SceneViewer class makes use of the functionality provided by CSceneViewer.

It uses the default Scene provided by the CSceneViewer class and adds two menus namely : Window Menu and help menu.

Example Program: 

//======================================================================== 
// Project: 
// ---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
// Package: 
// Authors: 
// Start Date: Tue Mar 27 14:19:38 est 2001
// ----------------------------------------------------------------------  
// File: SceneViewer.t.cpp
// Example program for the class SceneViewer.
//========================================================================  
 

// ----- Standard Libaries -----
#include <iostream.h>

// ----- QRTS Libraries -----
#include "QWidgets.hpp"
#include "CRenderArea.hpp"

// ----- Project Includes -----
#include "CSceneViewer.hpp"
#include "SceneViewer.hpp"
 
//======================================================================== 
// main
//========================================================================  
 
int main()
{
  PtInit (0);
  SceneViewer *newScene = new SceneViewer ( 0, "Scene Viewer", 0, 400, 400 );
  // newScene->setFrontView ();
  newScene->realize ();
  PtMainLoop ();
  return 0;
}

void updateScene ( ) [protected, virtual]
 

Updates the Scene by changing the object properties. Note: It also makes a call to update the list of objects in the scene.
